definitions.text: the phenomenon of light emission by a body as its temperature is raised
a steady even light without flames
the amount of electromagnetic radiation leaving or arriving at a point on a surface
emit a steady even light without flames
examples: The fireflies were glowing and flying about in the garden

definitions.text: have a complexion with a strong bright color, such as red or pink
examples: Her face glowed when she came out of the sauna

definitions.text: shine intensely, as if with heat
examples: The coals were glowing in the dark

definitions.text: experience a feeling of well-being or happiness, as from good health or an intense emotion
